launchpad_s_plus

Class ReceiveMidiMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • launchpad_s_plus.ReceiveMidiMessage

  • public class ReceiveMidiMessage
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is used to notify all observers that an input has been received.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReceiveMidiMessage(int x, int y, boolean onOrOff)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getDataReceived()
      Returns the current session's Received Data in Bytes
      static int getNumberOfPadsPressed()
      Returns the current session's Pads Pressed
      static int getPositionX()
      Returns X position of the last received or released key
      static int getPositionY()
      Returns Y position of the last receive or released key
      static boolean getStatus()
      Returns true if the last action was a key press
      Returns false if the last action was a key release
      private static void incrementPadsPressed()
      Increments the number of the current session's Pads Pressed and updates the statistics
      void notifyPressed()
      Notifies listeners that an input has been received

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReceiveMidiMessage

        public ReceiveMidiMessage(int x,
                          int y,
                          boolean onOrOff)
        Constructor called every time there is a received input from the Launchpad S. Also notifies all observers
        Parameters:
        x - X location of the received input
        y - Y location of the received input
        onOrOff - True if the received input was a key press, False if it was a key release

        Returns X position of the last received or released key
        Returns:
        int

      • getPositionY

        public static int getPositionY()
        Returns Y position of the last receive or released key
        Returns:
        Y position of the last update received

      • getStatus

        public static boolean getStatus()
        Returns true if the last action was a key press
        Returns false if the last action was a key release
        Returns:
        True if the last update was a key press, False if it was a key release
